verses.roman:
'rājā'-hena jñāna kabhu nā kaila prakāśa
antare sakala jānena, bāhire udāsa

synonyms: rājā—the King; hena jñāna—such knowledge; kabhu—at any time; nā—not; kaila prakāśa—manifested; antare—within the heart; sakala—everything; jānena—knows; bāhire—externally; udāsa—indifferent.
translation: Although within His heart Caitanya Mahāprabhu knew everything that was happening, externally He did not disclose it. Nor did He disclose that He knew He was talking with King Pratāparudra.
